summary: An ordinance relating to the municipal light and power plant and system; providing for the employment of the Constant Angle Arch Dam Company in connection with the construction of the concrete arch dam across the Skagit River at Diablo Canyon contemplated by Ordinance No. 52134; authorizing the execution of an agreement in respect thereto; transferring from the Light Fund to the construction fund created by said Ordinance the sum of Fifteen Thousand ($15,000.00) Dollars, as a temporary loan; and authorizing expenditures and appropriating funds therefor.
